Description:
Crossing the rift has taken a harder toll than you thought and you quickly regain consciousness.

When you open your eyes, you see that a soldier from the nearby camp approaches you and says:

"You must be the backup group! Perfect, the vanguard has already entered the volcano, led by the king's advisor Amelia and Chancellor Cornelius of the Burning Hand.
DescriptionAction: You must not waste any more time, you must enter through the tunnel and reach them to help them quell the Obsidian Uprising."

When you are alone and enter the tunnel she says:

(Amelia) \"The rift we crossed must have been a time rift and it has sent us back in time, specifically 30 years ago. We have to find another time rift so we can return to our time.

I remember this tunnel... together with Cornelius, Nenukil, Wilbur and a small group of soldiers, we entered the volcano to quell the uprising. In the end, after several unforeseen events, we defeated the dwarf generals and managed to escape from the volcano.

Chasing myself seems weird... I hope everything goes well...\"", "SSRewardTier": "", "SSRoll": false, "SSRollCard": "None", "SSRollMode": "HigherOrEqual", "SSRollNumber": 0, "SSRollNumberCritical": 0, "SSRollNumberCriticalFail": After hearing that, Nenukil, stunned, takes a good look at his surroundings and realizes... The rift has taken him back in time, specifically 30 years ago, when Nenukil helped Amelia quell the uprising of his people. Nenukil's face pales little by little just thinking about having to relive the fall of the Black Forge.

Without many other options and in order not to attract more attention, you agree to enter the tunnel in the hopes of finding a way to return to your time.\npyromancer", "SSRewardTier": "", "SSRoll": (Cornelius) \"Oh... I see, we're in the past. This must be when those damn dwarves started building machines and attacked my people... They killed dozens of members of the Burning Hand, including my son and his wife.

{ "medsEvent": "e_uprising1_a", "medsTempID": "e_uprising1_a_4", "DustCost": 0, "GoldCost": 0, "IndexForAnswerTranslation": 4, "RepeatForAllCharacters": false, "RepeatForAllWarriors": false, "RepeatForAllScouts": false, "RepeatForAllMages": false, "RepeatForAllHealers": false, "ReplyActionText": "CharacterName", "ReplyShowCard": "", "ReplyText": "Follow me into the tunnel and give me a moment.", "RequiredClass": "loremaster", "Requirement": "", "RequirementBlocked": "", "RequirementCard": [], "RequirementItem": "", "RequirementMultiplayer": false, "RequirementSku": "", "SSAddCard1": "", "SSAddCard2": "", "SSAddCard3": "", "SSAddItem": "", "SSCardPlayerGame": false, "SSCardPlayerGamePackData": "", "SSCardPlayerPairsGame": false, "SSCardPlayerPairsGamePackData": "", "SSCharacterReplacement": "", "SSCharacterReplacementPosition": 0, "SSCombat": "", "SSCorruptionUI": false, "SSItemCorruptionUI": false, "SSCorruptItemSlot": "None", "SSCraftUI": false, "SSCraftUIMaxType": "Common", "SSDiscount": 0, "SSDustReward": 0, "SSEvent": "", "SSExperienceReward": 8, "SSFinishEarlyAccess": false, "SSFinishGame": false, "SSFinishObeliskMap": false, "SSGoldReward": 0, "SSHealerUI": false, "SSLootList": "", "SSMaxQuantity": 0, "SSMerchantUI": false, "SSNodeTravel": "", "SSPerkData": "", "SSPerkData1": "", "SSRemoveItemSlot": "None", "SSRequirementLock": "", "SSRequirementLock2": "", "SSRequirementUnlock": "", "SSRequirementUnlock2": "", "SSRewardHealthFlat": 0, "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0, "SSRewardText": "Wilbur urges you to follow him and when he reaches the tunnel, he takes out one of his books and starts flipping through the pages, after a while he says:

(Wilbur) \"As I suspected... mmm... it must have been the rift we crossed, but without a doubt we are in the past, specifically 30 years ago.

At that time, I was studying some dwarven engineering books in the Black Forge, when the dwarven uprising happened and I was kicked out of there. I joined Amelia's group to help her and, in the process, pick up those books.

I have the feeling that we were destined to come to the past, I still can't confirm it... but the way events happened, it could be that... Anyway, our only option to return to our time is to go forward.\"", "SSRewardTier": "", "SSRoll": false, "SSRollCard": "None", "SSRollMode": "HigherOrEqual", "SSRollNumber": 0, "SSRollNumberCritical": (Nezglekt) \"Aha, I see... it seems like we're in the past, specifically about 30 years ago. It must have been because of the rift we crossed.

It seems that at this time the Black Forge was still in operation and that it was just after this uprising that it was closed down. I've always been curious to see what it was like... Anyway, I detect a temporal energy similar to the crack we came from inside the forge.
